Description: Hamas attack triggers IDF response with over 5,000 terrorists infiltrating; IDF airstrikes begin
Strategic_Significance: Initial breach and retaliation

Description: Givati Brigade and 162nd Armoured Division raid up to 1 km into northern Gaza
Strategic_Significance: Limited territorial penetration before ground invasion

Description: Three-axis ground offensive launched to divide Gaza Strip
Strategic_Significance: Full-width ground invasion across Gaza

Description: IDF reaches approx 1 km from completely encircling Gaza City
Strategic_Significance: Near-complete Gaza City encirclement

Description: Complete encirclement of Gaza City; main routes cut
Strategic_Significance: Operational encirclement of Gaza City

Description: Northern Gaza under sustained Israeli control; shift to low-intensity fighting
Strategic_Significance: Phase transition to consolidation

Description: IDF encircles Khan Younis; advances towards Mediterranean coast
Strategic_Significance: Southern Gaza coastal advance

Description: Raid on Hamas Khan Younis Brigade HQ; discovery of training areas
Strategic_Significance: Targeting Hamas command infrastructure

Description: IDF withdraws ground forces from Khan Younis, maintains Netzarim Corridor control
Strategic_Significance: Strategic redeployment for Rafah assault

Description: Israeli forces seize operational control of Rafah border crossing
Strategic_Significance: Full control of Egypt-Gaza border crossing

Description: Complete operational control of 14 km Philadelphi Corridor along Egypt border
Strategic_Significance: Control of Gaza-Egypt border corridor; tunnel neutralization

Description: Israeli tanks advance more than 2 km into Bani Suheila, Khan Younis area
Strategic_Significance: Deepest documented penetration in southern Gaza urban zone

Description: Operation Gideon's Chariots begins after ceasefire breakdown
Strategic_Significance: Renewed offensive with territorial occupation goals

Description: Israel controls approx 40% of Gaza Strip, aims for 75% within two months
Strategic_Significance: Large-scale territorial control and civilian concentration plan

Description: IDF special forces conduct over 70 covert raids several km from border, targeting Hezbollah
Strategic_Significance: Extended covert operations targeting tunnels and weapons sites

Description: Massive aerial bombardment begins; 25 villages ordered evacuated north of Awali River
Strategic_Significance: Preparation for ground operations and weakening Hezbollah infrastructure

Description: Official limited ground raids with initial penetration of hundreds of meters
Strategic_Significance: First ground incursions with 45,000 troops deployed

Description: Israeli flag raised on Maroun al-Ras; operations in Ayta ash-Shab, Kafr Kila
Strategic_Significance: Village-level control and symbolic presence

Description: IDF reaches Litani River for first time since 2000; maximum penetration approx 10 km
Strategic_Significance: Strategic depth in Lebanon with major territorial control gains

Description: Ceasefire agreement; Israeli withdrawal timeline initiated
Strategic_Significance: Start of operational de-escalation and peacekeeping deployment

Description: Incomplete withdrawal; IDF maintains 5 outposts 2-10 km inside Lebanon
Strategic_Significance: Continued strategic presence in southern Lebanon
